title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain LLM integration for Ollama, enabling local model usage in chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, offering sync/async APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama, styled like ChatGPT with model management and chat history.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client SDK for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI tool with conversation history, prompt templates, and markdown output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM completions and inline chat via Ollama.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions workflows to automate Ollama model testing and benchmarking.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, enabling local models in RAG and question-answering pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with dependency injection and minimal API examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama-based chat completions and admin interface for model management.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper around Ollama REST API adding OpenAI-compatible endpoints and rate limiting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI-assisted writing and summarization using Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama REST API with tokio support.

title: ollama-flutter
summary: Flutter package for chatting with Ollama models on mobile and desktop.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama supporting JVM, Android, and native targets.
